summary: Makes Galathil do her surgery for free (alternative 200/300 gold)
descriptionHtml:
Because she likes you so much, Galathil decided to give you surgeries for free (200/300). 

[u] [b] ATTENTION [/b] [/u]
[color=red] DAWNGUARD REQUIRED [/color] (what a surprise)
No dialogue changes. I only changed the global value for the gold cost of the surgery to 0/200/300.
For some reason the price shown in the dialogue isn\'t changed, although it\'s related to the value I changed. (at least in my game it is this way)

[u] [b] COMPATIBILITY [/b] [/u]
Should be compatible with every mod that doesn\'t change the value for the price of the surgery.
I\'m [color=red] NOT [/color] responsible for any permanent damage caused by too much plastic surgery!

*sorry for my bad English, it\'s not my native Language*

When requested I can also make alternate versions with other values for the gold cost.
Feel free to edit the value by yourself.

Thanks to:
- Bethesda for Skyrim and the Creation Kit
author: xMaster2072

files.name: Surgery for free
